description:
Tarvos Talent is seeking a Marketing Communications Manager for a client located in North Austin. This position presents a unique opportunity to shape and lead a department within this esteemed company, which is widely recognized for its innovative approach and industry-leading service levels. The successful candidate will be rewarded with a comprehensive benefits package, which includes health, dental, and vision insurance, a 401k with employer match, and a generous paid time off policy. If you are a seasoned marketing professional looking for a challenging and rewarding role within a dynamic and innovative company, this position is for you!

The Marketing Communications Manager will be responsible for developing and implementing comprehensive marketing strategies, overseeing the planning and execution of all communications and media actions on all channels, including online and social media, managing the marketing department's budget and ensuring all marketing activities are cost-effective, and monitoring competition and trends in the industry.

The Marketing Communications Manager will need a bachelor’s degree and 7+ years of marketing experience.

For immediate and confidential consideration, please email your resume to Julie Lake Adams at jlakeadams@tarvostalent.com.
benefits: health, dental, and vision insurance, a 401k with employer match, and a generous paid time off policy
